name: THE DARK ROOM
description:
• WASD to move.
  • ENTER to eat the darkness.
    • If you do not eat, you will wither away and die.
  • Touching the enemy will kill you.
    • Pressing ENTER will draw the enemy towards you.
  • SPACE to shield yourself from the enemy.
    • You cannot shield if you are too hungry
    • BE CAREFUL: Holding SPACE will drain your health! 

A student project, made using P5.play.
